title: Can I force my Pixel 3 XL to connect to 2.4GHZ
content: I need to setup a smart plug that requires the smartphone be connected to the 2.4GHZ band of my dual band router. I've seen that some phones can select this, but can't find anywhere the Pixel 3 XL can select one band over another.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
